basics.label: Marketing and Corporate Communications / Merchant Services Transition Communications Project Manager
basics.summary: A results-oriented professional who cultivates strong and effective working relationships with internal and external partners to establish and achieve mutual communications objectives for advancement of company's business strategy.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Marketing and Corporate Communications/Merchant Services Transition - Communications Project Manager - Contractor
work.summary: Manage, write, and edit external client communications and content to meet transactional needs of multiple business merchants.
highlights: Managed project risk through comprehensive mitigation assessment and planning techniques.
Initiated, defined and managed marketing campaigns across business channels for direct mail programs within a matrixed environment.
Lead matrix process for cross-functional teams to develop and execute client communications.
Developed documentation; monitored and reported project status; assessed the effectiveness and accuracy of documentation.
Managed project risk through comprehensive assessment and planning techniques.
Managed work efforts through the project plan for basic scope control procedures using multiple functional resources.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Institutional Client Services, Marketing Project management for product implementations, asset consolidations and email campaign project requests.
highlights: Status reporting of project work related to implementation of tactical product, segment and institution-specific marketing programs.
